016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import java.util.Arrays;
019import java.util.List;
020
021/**
022 * The lipid category nomenclature follows the shorthand notation of
023 * <pre>Liebisch, G., Vizcaíno,
024 * J.A., Köfeler, H., Trötzmüller, M., Griffiths, W.J., Schmitz, G., Spener, F.,
025 * and Wakelam, M.J.O. (2013). Shorthand notation for lipid structures derived
026 * from mass spectrometry. J. Lipid Res. 54, 1523–1530.</pre>
027 *
028 * We use the associations to either LIPID MAPS categories where appropriate.
029 * 
030 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
031 * @author Nils Hoffmann
032 */
033public enum LipidCategory {
034
035    NO_CATEGORY("Unknown lipid category"),
036    UNDEFINED("Undefined lipid category"),
037    /* SLM:000117142 Glycerolipids */
038    GL("Glycerolipids"),
039    /* SLM:000001193 Glycerophospholipids */
040    GP("Glycerophospholipids"),
041    /* SLM:000000525 Sphingolipids */
042    SP("Sphingolipids"),
043    /* SLM:000500463 Steroids and derivatives */
044    ST("Sterollipids"),
045    /* SLM:000390054 Fatty acyls and derivatives */
046    FA("Fattyacyls"),
047    /* LipidMAPS [PK]*/
048    PK("Polyketides"),
049    /* LipidMAPS [SL]*/
050    SL("Saccharolipids");
051
052    private final String fullName;
053
054    private LipidCategory(String fullName) {
055        this.fullName = fullName;
056    }
057
058    public String getFullName() {
059        return this.fullName;
060    }
061
062    public static LipidCategory forFullName(String fullName) {
063        List<LipidCategory> matches = Arrays.asList(LipidCategory.values()).stream().filter((t) -> {
064            return t.getFullName().equalsIgnoreCase(fullName);
065        }).toList();
066        if (matches.isEmpty()) {
067            return LipidCategory.UNDEFINED;
068        } else if (matches.size() > 1) {
069            throw new ConstraintViolationException("Query string " + fullName + " found more than once in enum values! Please check enum definition: fullName is compared case insensitive!");
070        }
071        return matches.get(0);
072    }
073}
